alert.note: Alert for Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 5:11PM EDT until May 16 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Pike County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 510 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kimper, or 8 miles northeast of Pikeville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mcandrews around 525 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Phelps, Jamboree, Majestic and Woodman. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
